item.title: A new tree file for my notes
item.description: Context This section of my website is where I jot down notes that will be useful to my future self and hopefully to others. For years my notes have been organized into a set of folders that serve as categories that I thought were relevant. After 5 years and >120 notes, I realized that the categories were somewhat contrived (e.g. cli, linux), and that it was hard to locate a post and the assets were now managed consistently.
